# oracle bone script 甲骨文 jiǎgǔwén

abstract cursive form of elaborate Seal/Bronze script

Some signs show grave misidentifications, e.g. the whole series of 御 ≈ 8⋅𓀂

元 ≈ 元 looked similar in oracle script

天 ≈ 𐀪 tiān don Teri, Ter, and Ture

上 ≈ 二 shang ≈ zwein
上 ≈ 二 with lower stroke longer / curved
下 ≈ 二 with upper stroke longer / curved 𓇹
